message.body: hey man, great work on those two i know that was pretty far
Thanks
I'm gonna have to call it a night; I'm out of battery both literally and figuratively
Are you available to work this morning? I see you on the schedule so just confirming
Yep, I'm on until 1, i should be signed in on the app too
Just fixed the app
weird, I don't see you. Can you do me a favor and just toggle your availabilty for me?
thanks!
got you an order! Going to a VIP customer from Philly mag so just double check everything please!
K
got a double pickup for you at south st philly bagels. Deliver 6 and then 9 please.
Theyre out of french toast bagels, what should i ask for?
stand by
are they out of anything else?
No egg either, they suggest replacing with maple bagel
hang on, I'll call the customer
And thats no egg bagels and no french toast, all else in stock
ok, thanks!
replace the french toast with a plain bagel please
got a big order for you at Village Whiskey going to Penn.

Is there anyone else nearby who can take over this order? I was supposed to be somewhere around 1 and its going to be another 15 min before the food is even ready. If it's not possible to get someone else on it i can still take it
Never mind I've got it it's out for delivery
Sorry for the delays on this order...didn't realize village whiskey was going to take that long. I really appreciate you handling it.
I didn't have anyone else nearby or else I would have reassigned it
are you having trouble finding the customer?
Already delivered something must be wrong with my app
gotcha. Thanks alot!
